channel.title: Installing Huawei CSI on Huawei
channel.description: Recent content in Installing Huawei CSI on Huawei

item.title: Manually Installing Huawei CSI
item.description: This section describes how to manually install Huawei CSI. Currently, only the Kubernetes platform supports manual installation of Huawei CSI. Procedure Use a remote access tool, such as PuTTY, to log in to any master node in the cluster through the management IP address. Copy the manual directory in the Kubernetes CSI component package to any directory on the master node. Run the following command to create a namespace. kubectl create ns huawei-csi Go to the manual/esdk working directory.
